// Fibonacci series
00000000001000010000100000100110 // xor $r1, $r1, $r1
00000000010000100001000000100110 // xor $r2, $r2, $r2
00100000010000100000000000000001 // addi $r2, $r2, 1
00000000100001000010000000100110 // xor $r4, $r4, $r4
00100000100001000000000001011001 // addi $r4, $r4, 89
00000000101001010010100000100110 // xor $r5, $r5, $r5
11111111111000100000000000000000 // led $r2
00000000001000100001100000100000 // add $r3, $r2, $r1
00000000101000100000100000100000 // add $r1, $r2, $r5
00000000101000110001000000100000 // add $r2, $r3, $r5
00010100010001001111111111111011 // bne $r2, $r4, fibo



// show the character in $r2 on TTY
00100000010000100000000001100001 // addi $r2, $r2, 97
11111100111000100000000000000000 // tty $r2

// write the whole word written on the keyboard
11111101000000100000000000000000 // kb $r2
11111100111000100000000000000000 // tty $r2
00010100010000001111111111111101 // bne $r2, $r0, kb

// Turn LEDs on and off 
00100000010000100000000000000100 // addi $r2, $r2, 4
11111100010000100000000000000000 // led $r2
00100000000000100000000000000000 // addi $r2, $r0, 0
11111100010000100000000000000000 // led $r2
